SELECT nts.id, nts.code, nts.name, nts.level, nts.description, ntemail.code AS email_template_code, ntsms.code AS sms_template_code, ntpm.code AS pm_template_code FROM notify_send_setting nts LEFT JOIN notify_template ntemail on nts.email_template_id = ntemail.id LEFT JOIN notify_template ntsms on nts.sms_template_id = ntsms.id LEFT JOIN notify_template ntpm on nts.pm_template_id = ntpm.id WHERE level = #{level}
AND nts.code LIKE concat('%',#{code},'%')
AND nts.name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND nts.description LIKE concat('%',#{description},'%')
AND( nts.code LIKE concat('%',#{params},'%') OR nts.name LIKE concat('%',#{params},'%') OR nts.description LIKE concat('%',#{params},'%') )

SELECT nts.id, nts.code, nts.name, nts.description, nts.level, nts.retry_count, nts.is_send_instantly, nts.is_manual_retry, nts.object_version_number, ntemail.id AS email_template_id, ntemail.code AS email_template_code, ntsms.id AS sms_template_id, ntsms.code AS sms_template_code, ntpm.id AS pm_template_id, ntpm.code AS pm_template_code FROM notify_send_setting nts LEFT JOIN notify_template ntemail on nts.email_template_id = ntemail.id LEFT JOIN notify_template ntsms on nts.sms_template_id = ntsms.id LEFT JOIN notify_template ntpm on nts.pm_template_id = ntpm.id where nts.id = #{id}
